question.body: Which of the following disorders is a result of not being able to regulate calcium levels?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Diabetes is a result of not being able to control glucose levels.
Correct. Osteoporosis is a result of too little calcium in the bones.
Incorrect. Hyperthyroidism is a disorder caused by the excess activity of the thyroid gland.
Incorrect. Wilson’s disease is caused by excess copper in the body.
